Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 7:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023
